member.name: PALETTEENTRY
member.summary: Specifies the color and usage of an entry in a logical palette.

member.name: PALETTEENTRY.peRed
member.summary: The red intensity value for the palette entry.

member.name: PALETTEENTRY.peGreen
member.summary: The green intensity value for the palette entry.

member.name: PALETTEENTRY.peBlue
member.summary: The blue intensity value for the palette entry.

member.name: PALETTEENTRY.peFlags
member.summary: The alpha intensity value for the palette entry. Note that as of DirectX 8, this member is treated differently than documented for Windows.
